alert.note: Alert for Baca (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 05 at 7:36PM MDT until August 05 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM MDT FOR WEST CENTRAL BACA AND SOUTHEASTERN LAS ANIMAS COUNTIES... At 736 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles west of Kim, or 33 miles northeast of Des Moines, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Kim. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
